sentences.en: A prayer vigil is being held in the cathedral in memory of the bishop.
sentences.cn: 为了纪念这位主教，教堂里正在举行守夜祈祷。

sentences.en: All - Night Vigil , Op. 37, Vespers: Bless the Lord, O my soul.
sentences.cn: 守夜, 作品37, 晚祷: 祝福我主, 哦,我的灵魂.

sentences.en: All night the mother kept vigil over the sick child.
sentences.cn: 母亲通夜守护在病儿的身边.

sentences.en: Eva and Paul kept a constant vigil by their daughter’s hospital bedside.
sentences.cn: 伊娃和保罗一直在医院里守在女儿的病床边。

sentences.en: For three nights, the shepherd maintained his lonely vigil.
sentences.cn: 牧羊人孤零零地连续看守了三个晚上.

sentences.en: His parents kept a round-the-clock vigil at his bedside.
sentences.cn: 他父母日夜守护在他的床边。

sentences.en: His parents kept a vigil by his bedside as he was given brain and body scans.
sentences.cn: 在他做脑扫描和全身扫描时，他的父母守护在他床边。

sentences.en: Mourners are to stage a candlelit vigil in Liverpool.
sentences.cn: 哀悼者准备在利物浦筹备举行一次烛光祈祷。

sentences.en: Outside the building people continue their vigil, huddling around bonfires.
sentences.cn: 在房子外面，人们挤在篝火旁边，继续守夜。

sentences.en: She entered the house, and faced the long vigil of her death.
sentences.cn: 她走到家里, 面对着那早就注意着她的死神.

sentences.en: She kept a vigil at Patrick's bedside.
sentences.cn: 她在帕特里克的床边守夜。

sentences.en: She kept vigil at the bedside of her critically ill son.
sentences.cn: 她整夜都守在病重的儿子床边。

sentences.en: Ten minutes later his vigil was rewarded.
sentences.cn: 十分钟之后,他的守候终于有了收获.

sentences.en: The detectives resumed their vigil at the house.
sentences.cn: 侦探们又开始在那栋房子警戒了.

sentences.en: The vigil Mass will be preceded by a carol service at 9.30 pm.
sentences.cn: 在做守夜弥撒之前,9.30的时候先唱圣诞颂歌.

sentences.en: Why didn't you call on me to share your vigil?
sentences.cn: 为什么不叫我同你一块守夜 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 警惕的；警醒的；注意的；警戒的
义务警员；治安维持会成员

trans.tran_cn: 守夜，熬夜，节日（斋戒）前夜的守夜，警戒，监视，不眠
trans.tran_en: a period of time, especially during the night, when you stay awake in order to pray, remain with someone who is ill, or watch for danger
